alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McCreary and south central Whitley Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Heron, or near Whitley City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Strunk and Pine Knot around 505 PM EDT. Hollyhill around 510 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ayers and Zion Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
